title: How to delete the last 15 minutes of your Google search history
content:
Recently, Google added the ability for users on mobile to delete the last 15 minutes of their Google search history with one single tap. This guide will take you through how exactly you can do this on your device.

moreâ€¦

The post How to delete the last 15 minutes of your Google search history appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Need to quickly delete your search history in Google? Now there's a button only a couple of taps away on your phone.
